entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
